name: Army Helicopter: Fly Mission 3
description:
Army Helicopter: Fly Mission 3D is a modern warfare aerial strike helicopter arcade shooting game. The troops have to be transported from the army base to the point of battle. The user would be serving the army as a Helicopter Pilot who will perform various missions for the army like aerial strike on other bases, soldiers transport missions and ammunition movement mission.
Features
Free 3D game
Mountainous hilly environment
Missions to be completed in time
Challenging game play
Real life sound effects
Next gen hi-tech Army helicopter
